subdisciplines.name: Media Aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the art and beauty of media, including visual and auditory media.

subdisciplines.name: Media Ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how media and communication technologies affect human perception, understanding, feeling, and value.

subdisciplines.name: Media Sociology
subdisciplines.description: The study of media as a social institution, and the social and cultural forces that shape media and media use.

subdisciplines.name: Media Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the psychological effects of media on individuals and groups, including cognition, emotion, and behavior.
